org.prop4j.solver

Class ModifiableSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.prop4j.solver.BasicSolver
      • org.prop4j.solver.ModifiableSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ISatSolver

    public class ModifiableSolver
extends BasicSolver
    Finds certain solutions of propositional formulas. Clauses can be removed.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter
